entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
